FROM openjdk:8-jre-alpine

ENV SPRING_OUTPUT_ANSI_ENABLED=ALWAYS \
    JHIPSTER_SLEEP=0 \
    JAVA_OPTS=""
    
ENV JAVA_CACERTS=$JAVA_HOME/lib/security/cacerts

#
# Download certificate from wiki
ADD https://aeropost.com/cert-auth/ca.cert.der /tmp
RUN echo yes | keytool -keystore $JAVA_CACERTS -storepass changeit -importcert -alias aeropost -file /tmp/ca.cert.der

# Add a jhipster user to run our application so that it doesn't need to run as root
RUN adduser -D -s /bin/sh jhipster
WORKDIR /home/jhipster

ADD entrypoint.sh entrypoint.sh
RUN chmod 755 entrypoint.sh && chown jhipster:jhipster entrypoint.sh
USER jhipster

ADD *.war app.war

ENTRYPOINT ["./entrypoint.sh"]

EXPOSE 8081 5701/udp
